hero.description: AutoApply AI discovers relevant jobs, scores your compatibility, and generates ATS-optimized resumes and cover letters — all tailored to each specific role.
hero.noCreditCard: No credit card required. 3 free tailored documents per month.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps from upload to application-ready documents.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Upload your master CV (PDF, DOCX, or paste text). We extract and structure your experience.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Tell us your target roles, locations, salary range, and remote preferences. We search every 4 hours.
howItWorks.step3Desc: For each matching job, get a tailored CV and cover letter — ATS-optimized, zero fabrication.

features.title: Built for Serious Job Seekers
features.subtitle: Every feature designed to maximize your chances while keeping your data safe.
features.smartDiscoveryDesc: Aggregates listings from Adzuna, The Muse, Remotive, and more — all from official APIs. No scraping, no ToS violations.
features.aiScoringDesc: Each job is scored 0-100 against your profile based on skills match (40%), experience (25%), education (15%), and domain relevance (20%).
features.atsDocumentsDesc: Tailored resume and cover letter per job, optimized for Applicant Tracking Systems. Keywords injected naturally from your real experience.
features.automatedPipelineDesc: Set preferences once. Every 4 hours, new matching jobs are discovered and documents prepared automatically for your review.
features.privacyFirstDesc: GDPR-compliant. No credential storage. No automated logins. Your data stays yours with one-click export and deletion.
features.antiHallucinationDesc: Zero tolerance for fabricated content. AI only reorders, rephrases, and emphasizes what's already in your CV. Nothing invented.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you're ready to supercharge your job search.
pricing.creditPackDesc: Need more credits? Get a Credit Pack — 10 additional documents for $19 (one-time).

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Job Search?
cta.subtitle: Join job seekers who are landing interviews faster with AI-tailored applications.

footer.tagline: AI-powered career assistant. ATS-optimized, zero fabrication.
footer.officialApis: All job data sourced from official APIs only. No scraping.
